structural_units.address:
Narva mnt 18
51009 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: The seminars take place during two semesters. The topics covered in the seminars and the corresponding homework have been planned in a way that support the students during their participation in the IMP and Sandbox Programme and equip them with practical skills to manage their self-development during and after the program.
description.et: Seminarid toimuvad läbi kahe semestri. Seminarides läbitud teemad ja kaasnevad kodutööd on planeeritud nii, et need toetavad üliõpilasi ITTM-i ja Sandboxi programmide läbimisel ning annavad kaasa praktilised oskused, millega juhtida oma enesearengut ka edaspidises elus.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to support students participating in the Industrial Master's (IMP) and Sandbox Programmes and provide the necessary abilities for them to complete it.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on üliõpilaste toetamine IT-tööstusmagistrantuuri (ITTM) ja Sandboxi programmide läbimisel ja selleks vajalike oskuste arendamine.

learning_outcomes.en: A student that has taken the course has:
developed their understanding and gained practical skills in topics such as self-management and -analysis, time management and focusing, creativity, coping with stress;
learning_outcomes.et: * arendanud oma arusaamasid ning saanud praktilisi oskuseid teemadel nagu enesejuhtimine- ja analüüs, ajajuhtimine ja keskendumine, loovus, toimetulek stressiga
